name: Onemogući sleep i isključoivanje zaslona
command: powercfg -change -monitor-timeout-ac 0 && powercfg -change -monitor-timeout-dc 0 && powercfg -change -standby-timeout-ac 0 && powercfg -change -standby-timeout-dc 0 && powercfg -change -hibernate-timeout-ac 0 && powercfg -change -hibernate-timeout-dc 0
